frameDefinitions: An Entity ends up with some Final_quality--a new fact about the Entity.
A Recipient starts off without the Theme in their possession, and then comes to possess it.
A Resisting_entity is capable of resisting or does resist a physical Opposing_force to a level specified by the target.
An Entity ends up in a Final_category, Final_situation, or Final_quality which it was not in before.
These words refer to Parts merging to form a Whole.
frameExamples: The great and <t>impregnable</t> fortress still stands today.
The two droplets <t>merge</t>, and then travel down the windowpane even faster.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Entity</fen> which undergoes a change, newly ending up in the <fen>Final_category</fen> or taking on a new <fen>Final_quality</fen>.
A description of a characteristic of the <fen>Entity</fen> after the change.
The category that the <fen>Entity</fen> ends up in after the change.  Typically, this entails taking on a number of new characteristics.
>When the change occurs.
Where the change takes place.
The <fen>Recipient</fen> indicates the entity that ends up in possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The <fen>Theme</fen> is the object that changes possession.
When the event occurs.
The <fen>Place</fen> denotes where the Getting takes place.
The <fen>Resisting_entity</fen> is the item that resists the <fen>Opposing_force</fen> to the level specified by the target.

The <fen>Opposing_force</fen> is the item placed in opposition to the <fen>Resisting_entity</fen>. <fen>Opposing_force</fen> hinders, blocks, helps, or allows (lets) the <fen>Resisting_entity</fen> to resist at the level specified by the target. Sometimes this Core role is incorporated in the target; otherwise, it is often null instantiated in example sentences.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Resisting_entity</fen> resists an external force.
The location where the <fen>Resisting_entity</fen> resists an external force.
The <fen>Entity</fen> which undergoes a change, ending up in the <fen>Final_category</fen>, <fen>Final_situation</fen>, or <fen>Final_quality</fen>.
The quality of the <fen>Entity</fen> after the change.
The category that the <fen>Entity</fen> ends up in after the change.
The <fen>Entity</fen>'s situation after the change.
When the change occurs.
Where the change takes place.
The entities that merge to form a single <fen>Whole</fen>.
The single, undifferentiated entity that is the result of the amalgamation.
The prominent entity that combines with <fen>Part_2</fen> to form a <fen>Whole</fen>.
The less focussed-upon entity that the <fen>Part_1</fen> merges with.
The time at which the <fen>Parts</fen> become amalgamated into a <fen>Whole</fen>
The location at which the amalgamation occurs.
A force, process, or event that produces an effect.
Agents in a joint or reciprocal action (e.g. exchange)
A positive or negative evaluation of the Phenomenon.
An entity which participates in a <fen>Cause</fen>, perhaps volitionally and perhaps not.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the event occurs.
Where the event takes place.
listRoleExamples: He never could understand how she ended up <fex>an evangelist</fex>.
<fex>By 1945</fex> he had become uncertain of the advisability of anyone having such a weapon.
These are made from a tough <fex>plastic foam</fex> and are very light to wear.
The fortress was impregnable <fex>to attack by hostile invaders</fex>.
The retaining wall was even weaker <fex>yesterday</fex>, and had begun to crumble.
They decided the tree-house would be sturdiest <fex>in the big old backyard oak</fex>.
He never could understand how she ended up <fex>an evangelist</fex>.
My father got <fex>to where he did in the business</fex> through instinct and entrepreneurialism.
<fex>By 1945</fex> he had become uncertain of the advisability of anyone having such a weapon.
They had all just merged <fex>into one big file</fex>.
<fex>The single smaller soul</fex> merges with the Ur-soul.
The single smaller soul merges <fex>with the Ur-soul</fex>.
<fex>That one stone</fex>, apparently, caused the avalanche that engulfed square miles of forest.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: a Wonderful Life and Touch of Evil
The longest year and a half
